pages.text: The block where a Witcher can accept and exchange $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contracts$(). A necessary item to utilise the Witcher's full arsenal of abilities. Acts as the job block for the $(l:contracts/contracts#page_sentinels)Sentinel Villager$() profession.
Ingredients: Wooden Planks x4, $(l:crafting/enriched_dimeritium_ingot#page_enriched_dimeritium)Enriched Dimeritium Ingot x2$()
